name: ERC721 NFT metadata extension
description: Allows NFT token to be interrogated for its name and for details about the assets which NFTs represent.

functionDecorators.name: Name
functionDecorators.description: Returns the name of this ERC721 nft collection

functionDecorators.name: Symbol
functionDecorators.description: Returns the symbol defined for this ERC721 collection at constructon time.

functionDecorators.name: Token URI
functionDecorators.description: Returns token URI for given token ID. Token URI describes the actual digital content connected to the given token. This can for example be a link to the image file if the nft itself is an image or digital art.

parameterDecorators.name: Token ID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the token for which we want to fetch the token URI value.

returnDecorators.name: Token URI
returnDecorators.description: Returns a distinct Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for a given asset.
